subject: Login errors after SSO update
description: Users report 'Invalid SAML response' after updating IdP metadata. Affected users cannot log in.

subject: Billing portal timing out
description: Customers see a timeout when opening invoices. Issue started after last release.

subject: API rate limit confusion
description: Integration receives 429 errors and is unsure how to request higher limits.

subject: Password reset emails delayed
description: Reset emails arrive 30-40 minutes late for EU tenants.

subject: Data export missing columns
description: CSV export no longer includes custom fields 'Region' and 'Tier'.

subject: Mobile app crash on launch
description: iOS app crashes immediately after login screen. No recent device changes reported.
